entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry, is described as the one who snapped the earmuffs over his ears.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is introduced as a person who puts on earmuffs and rolls up her sleeves to work with plants.

entities.name: earmuffs
entities.description: Earmuffs are described as objects that can be put over ears to shut out sound.

entities.name: tufty plants
entities.description: Tufty plants are introduced as the type of plant that Professor Sprout is working with.

relationships.description: Harry wore earmuffs over his ears to shut out sound, as described in the text: 'Harry snapped the earmuffs over his ears.'
Professor Sprout also wore earmuffs, as described in the text: 'Professor Sprout put a pink fluffy pair over her own ears.'
Professor Sprout worked with tufty plants, as described in the text: 'and pulled hard' while grasping one of the tufty plants firmly.
